typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double,
		InternationalAviation as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Aviation
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> GroundTransport
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Industry
source(output(
		Date as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		World as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> InternationalShipping
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Power
source(output(
		{_c0} as date 'MM/dd/yyyy',
		China as double,
		India as double,
		US as double,
		{EU27&UK} as double,
		Russia as double,
		Japan as double,
		Brazil as double,
		ROW as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Resindential
Aviation unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Avaition as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
GroundTransport unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		GroundTransport as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot2
Industry unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Industry as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot3
Power unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Power as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot4
Resindential unpivot(output(
		Country as string,
		Residential as double
	),
	ungroupBy({_c0}),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot5
Unpivot1, Unpivot2, Unpivot3, Unpivot4, Unpivot5 union(byName: false)~> Union1
